The Castle thing isnt too impressive, although i does work but I dont understand everyones amazement. You look at the bloack dot on the castle, and stare at it when it becomes just a blob of color. The rods and cones in your eyes that see color get lazy when you stare at something, so the image of that color remains. So when its black and white castle time again, the image of that color is still there for a second.

i think i can explain the castle illusion. 

first of all, they show you a picture of a castle with no color, and after the count down ends. they'll show you a quick colored version of the same castle at the same position very quickly, and switch it back instantly. considering your opening your eye and constantly starring at the dot, your eye wont notice that the picture has changed. you dont even have to starr at it. just watch it over again and you'll notice the change of pictures.
